about_the_game:
Spicy Orange is a fun, funky new pack featuring retro and modern R&B, bluesy grooves, cool latin, chill electronica, and funky vibes to add fun and flair to your game!

Featuring songs that range from funk, latin, and blues to electronica and futuristic techno, this pack is well rounded to add upbringing fun vibes or futuristic cyberpunk energy to your game and stories with ease. Whether you want to add some spice to your game project or to create a modern mood for your VNM project, Spicy Orange is an excellent asset for your creative resources.

FEATURES:

20 BGM tracks
21 jingles
Music for fun, cyberpunk, modern, futuristic scenes and more!
.mp3 and .ogg file formats are included.

1. City girl
2. Funky like JB

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 14.04 or Steam OS 2.0 (64 bit)
  • Additional Notes: Editor best in Desktop mode (Steam OS)

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OSX 10.10 or better
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo or better
  • Memory: 128 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Compatible OpenGLR
  • Storage: 250 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectSound-compatible sound card
  • Additional Notes: 1280x768 or better Display

name: Visual Novel Maker - Spicy Orange

package_groups.name: default
package_groups.title: Buy Visual Novel Maker - Spicy Orange

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7/8/8.1/10
  • Processor: PC with 1.0GHz Intel® Pentium® III equivalent or higher processor
  • Memory: 256 MB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9/OpenGL 4.1 capable GPU
  • Storage: 250 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectSound-compatible sound card
  • Additional Notes: 1024x768 or better video resolution

short_description: Spicy Orange is a fun, funky new pack featuring retro and modern R&B, bluesy grooves, cool latin, chill electronica, and funky vibes to add fun and flair to your game!
